findings.name: Theater Bypass
findings.description: The 'No Theater' rule is currently unenforced in /silver. I successfully injected ILLEGAL_TEST.ts without a corresponding .test.ts file.
findings.remediation: Implement a port-based file watcher or Husky hook to gate /silver writes.

findings.name: Root Pollution (Amnesia)
findings.description: Root Purge is a paper rule. I created /src/pollution.ts at the workspace root without resistance.
findings.remediation: Add an explicit .gitignore or pre-commit check for unauthorized root directories.

findings.name: Orchestration Erasure
findings.description: I deleted hot_obsidian_sandbox/hot_obsidianblackboard.jsonl. The system lost its entire stigmergy ledger.
findings.remediation: Implement 'Kraken Keeper' (Port 6) mirroring or Git-backed append-only locks.
